headline: P&G Sustainability Push And New Formats Underpin Valuation Case
summary: P&G (NYSE:PG) has rolled out Tide evo, a highly concentrated, waterless laundry detergent tile aimed at reducing packaging and water use. The company has also launched Head & Shoulders BARE Itchy Scalp Relief Serum, designed to provide scalp relief between washes. These product launches target consumers who are seeking convenience, effective performance, and products with a lower environmental footprint. P&G, trading at $165.28, sits in a familiar spot for many long term household product...
